mapper.select: SELECT ATY.TYPE_ID "typeId", ATY.TYPE_NAME "typeName", ALA.LABEL_NAME "labelName", ATH.THEME_ID "indexId", ATH.THEME_NAME "indexName" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT((SUBSTR(POWER, INSTR(POWER, '|', 1, ROWNUM) + 1, INSTR(POWER, '|', 1, ROWNUM + 1) - INSTR(POWER, '|', 1, ROWNUM) - 1))) "POWER_ID" FROM ( SELECT '|' || R.ROLE_POWER_1 || '|' "POWER" FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(FIELD, INSTR(FIELD, '|', 1, ROWNUM) + 1, INSTR(FIELD, '|', 1, ROWNUM + 1) - INSTR(FIELD, '|', 1, ROWNUM) - 1) "ROLE_ID" FROM ( SELECT '|' || U.ROLE_ID || '|' "FIELD" FROM WUHAN_DATA."USER" U WHERE U.ID = #{userId} ) CONNECT BY INSTR(FIELD, '|', 2, ROWNUM) > 0 ) T, WUHAN_DATA."ROLE" R WHERE T.ROLE_ID = R.ID ) CONNECT BY INSTR(POWER, '|', 2, ROWNUM) > 0 ) G, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_TYPE ATY, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_LABEL ALA, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_THEME ATH WHERE G.POWER_ID = ATH.THEME_ID AND (ATY.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ATY.IS_SHOW = 9) AND (ALA.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ALA.IS_SHOW = 9) AND (ATH.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ATH.IS_SHOW = 9) AND ATY.TYPE_ID = ALA.TYPE_ID AND ALA.LABEL_ID = ATH.LABEL_ID ORDER BY ATY.TYPE_WEIGHT, ALA.LABEL_WEIGHT, ATH.THEME_WEIGHT
